attributes.action: Teach the history of black people before slavery in learning institutes.
attributes.additional_details:
My motivation is my two little boys, i will fight for them to have a role model that looks EXACTLY like them, from the past present and future (We see you freedom fighters).
If anyone would like to do their own research on black history there is a link below which will help you do just that.

https://hiddencolorsfilm.com
attributes.background: As a mixed raced woman I realised I knew alot about my white history from school, my african background on the otherhand I knew only of one event, which is slavery. I then learnt my melinated ancestors were royalty, powerful and genius. This hidden info instills self worth and is crucial to our race
